If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses. // Help Dialogs HHS Moodle This is the Browser shows you our school Moodle platform. Functionality You can save every website as a bookmark or share it. If you click on the star, your bookmarks will be shown. Just try all the menu entries. Bookmarks Here all your saved bookmarks are shown. If you click on the star the bookmark will be saved as your favorite and will load, when you open the browser. Menus Check the menu (also the toolbar), change the icons. A long click on an entry will also open a menu. Todo list Click on an entry to open it. Click on the exclamation mark and you will get a notification in your statusbar. You can also change the priority of an entry. A long click opens a menu. The list A short click will delete the entry, with a long click you can edit it. Notes Here you can create notes with attachments. Practically You can also receive text from other apps to create a note. A short click on an entry will open the note, a long click will open (as always) a menu. Random generator You can just roll a dice (\"dice icon\") or choose somebody randomly from a list. Create a list You can create a list on your own, or import from a subject or course list. Grade calculation Moodle calculates grades in percentage. It uses the percentage of the maximum reachable points. Grade table Enter the maximum of reachable points. Then you can see your grade ant the percentage of the reachable points. Course lists With a course list you can create several lists. All members of the course list are in the new generated list. Import list Copy a text file in the \"HHS_Moodle-Folder\" of your sd-card. In every line should be the name of a member of the new course list. File manager With the build in file manager you can browse you can browse through the downloaded files and other content on your sd-card. File operations You can open (click), share and delete (long click) files. Counter With the counter you can create lists with different entries. Each entry has start value of \"0\". +/- With a simple click you can add or subtract \"1\" to the current value. Of course you can also edit each entry. Settings Here you can change your login data, if they are not actual. You can also change the behavior of the app. Security It is highly recommended to protect the app with a pin against unwanted access. Grant permission Only for Android Marshmallow and above: Grant used permission by opening \"Permissions\" in the next window. After that restart the app.
